plot: When a struggling car wash owner goes on the rampage in the city leaving clues behind her, a suspended detective takes the law into his own hands.
title: Clean Getaway
plot_es: When a struggling car wash owner goes on the rampage in the city leaving clues behind her, a suspended detective takes the law into his own hands.
plot_en: When a struggling car wash owner goes on the rampage in the city leaving clues behind her, a suspended detective takes the law into his own hands.
